001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client;
003
004import static java.util.Objects.requireNonNull;
005
006import java.net.URI;
007import java.util.*;
008import java.util.function.Function;
009import java.util.function.Supplier;
010
011import javax.annotation.Nullable;
012
013import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.error.HttpExceptionFactory;
014import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http.*;
015import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.oauth2.*;
016
017import org.apache.commons.lang3.SystemUtils;
018
019/**
020    <p>The ClientBuilder is used to configure and create an {@link ApiHttpClient}. As the ApiHttpClient uses a {@link HandlerStack stack}
021    of middlewares the Builder comes with methods to configure and attach new middlewares. Also it ensures that some default
022    used middlewares are instantiated at the correct location in the middleware stack.</p>
023
024    <p>The default middlewares and services are added as Supplier to be able to override the ones provided by e.g.: {@link #defaultClient(URI)}</p>
025 */
026public class ClientBuilder implements Builder<ApiHttpClient> {
027    public static final String COMMERCETOOLS = "commercetools";
028    static final String userAgent = "commercetools-sdk-java-v2/";
029
030    private URI apiBaseUrl;
031    private Supplier<ErrorMiddleware> errorMiddleware;
032    private Supplier<OAuthMiddleware> oAuthMiddleware;
033    private Supplier<RetryMiddleware> retryMiddleware;
034    private InternalLoggerMiddleware internalLoggerMiddleware;
035    private UserAgentMiddleware userAgentMiddleware;
036    private List<Middleware> middlewares = new ArrayList<>();
037    private Supplier<HandlerStack> stack;
038    private VrapHttpClient httpClient;
039    private Supplier<ResponseSerializer> serializer;
040    private Supplier<HttpExceptionFactory> httpExceptionFactory;
041
042    /**
043     * <p>Creates a default client builder</p>
044     * @return ClientBuilder instance
045     */
046    public static ClientBuilder of() {
047        return new ClientBuilder();
048    }
049
050    /**
051     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specific or preconfigured {@link VrapHttpClient} instance. Uses defaults for
052     * the {@link HandlerStack}</p>
053     * @param httpClient the HTTP client to be used
054     * @return ClientBuilder instance
055     */
056    public static ClientBuilder of(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
057        return new ClientBuilder(httpClient);
058    }
059
060    /**
061     * <p>Creates a client builder with a specifig {@link HandlerStack}</p>
062     * @param stack the HandlerStack to be used
063     * @return ClientBuilder instance
064     */
065    public static ClientBuilder of(final HandlerStack stack) {
066        return new ClientBuilder(stack);
067    }
068
069    private ClientBuilder(final HandlerStack stack) {
070        this.stack = () -> stack;
071        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
072        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
073        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
074    }
075
076    private ClientBuilder() {
077        this.httpClient = HttpClientSupplier.of().get();
078        this.stack = stackSupplier();
079        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
080        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
081        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
082    }
083
084    /**
085     * Ensures the order of default middlewares to create a {@link HandlerStack}
086     * @return HandlerStack supplier method
087     */
088    private Supplier<HandlerStack> stackSupplier() {
089        return () -> {
090            final List<Middleware> middlewareStack = new ArrayList<>();
091            Optional.ofNullable(errorMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
092            Optional.ofNullable(internalLoggerMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
093            Optional.ofNullable(userAgentMiddleware).map(middlewareStack::add);
094            Optional.ofNullable(oAuthMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
095            Optional.ofNullable(retryMiddleware).map(m -> middlewareStack.add(m.get()));
096            middlewareStack.addAll(middlewares);
097            return HandlerStack.create(HttpHandler.create(requireNonNull(httpClient)), middlewareStack);
098        };
099    }
100
101    private ClientBuilder(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
102        this.httpClient = httpClient;
103        this.stack = stackSupplier();
104        ResponseSerializer serializer = ResponseSerializer.of();
105        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
106        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> HttpExceptionFactory.of(this.serializer.get());
107    }
108
109    public ClientBuilder withHandlerStack(final HandlerStack stack) {
110        this.stack = () -> stack;
111        return this;
112    }
113
114    public ClientBuilder withHttpClient(final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
115        this.httpClient = httpClient;
116        return this;
117    }
118
119    public ClientBuilder withSerializer(final ResponseSerializer serializer) {
120        this.serializer = () -> serializer;
121        return this;
122    }
123
124    public ClientBuilder withSerializer(final Supplier<ResponseSerializer> serializer) {
125        this.serializer = serializer;
126        return this;
127    }
128
129    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final HttpExceptionFactory factory) {
130        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> factory;
131        return this;
132    }
133
134    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final Function<ResponseSerializer, HttpExceptionFactory> factory) {
135        this.httpExceptionFactory = () -> factory.apply(serializer.get());
136        return this;
137    }
138
139    /**
140     * configures the Factory for HTTP exception in case.
141     * @param factory
142     * @return
143     */
144    public ClientBuilder withHttpExceptionFactory(final Supplier<HttpExceptionFactory> factory) {
145        this.httpExceptionFactory = factory;
146        return this;
147    }
148
149    /**
150     * <p>Configures a client with the default middlewares and the given baseUrl</p>
151     * <p>The following middlewares and services are configured:
152     * <ul>
153     *     <li>{@link ErrorMiddleware}</li>
154     *     <li>{@link ResponseSerializer}</li>
155     *     <li>{@link InternalLoggerFactory}</li>
156     *     <li>{@link UserAgentMiddleware}</li>
157     *     <li>{@link AcceptGZipMiddleware}</li>
158     * </ul>
159     * </p>
160     * @param apiBaseUrl base URI for the API
161     * @return ClientBuilder instance
162     */
163    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final URI apiBaseUrl) {
164        return withApiBaseUrl(apiBaseUrl).withErrorMiddleware()
165                .withSerializer(ResponseSerializer.of())
166                .withInternalLoggerFactory((request, topic) -> InternalLogger.getLogger(COMMERCETOOLS + "." + topic))
167                .withUserAgentSupplier(ClientBuilder::buildDefaultUserAgent)
168                .addAcceptGZipMiddleware();
169    }
170
171    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final String apiBaseUrl) {
172        return defaultClient(URI.create(apiBaseUrl));
173    }
174
175    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final String apiBaseUrl, final ClientCredentials credentials,
176            final String tokenEndpoint) {
177        return defaultClient(apiBaseUrl).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
178    }
179
180    public ClientBuilder defaultClient(final ClientCredentials credentials,
181            final ServiceRegionConfig serviceRegionConfig) {
182        return defaultClient(serviceRegionConfig.getApiUrl()).withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials,
183            serviceRegionConfig.getOAuthTokenUrl());
184    }
185
186    /**
187     * @deprecated use withClientCredentialsFlow instead
188     * @param credentials OAuth credentials
189     * @param tokenEndpoint OAuth endpoint
190     * @return client builder
191     */
192    @Deprecated
193    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentials(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
194        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint);
195    }
196
197    /**
198     * @deprecated use withClientCredentialsFlow instead
199     * @param credentials OAuth credentials
200     * @param tokenEndpoint OAuth endpoint
201     * @param httpClient HTTP client to be used
202     * @return client builder
203     */
204    @Deprecated
205    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentials(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
206            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
207        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
208    }
209
210    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint) {
211        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString());
212    }
213
214    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final URI tokenEndpoint,
215            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
216        return withClientCredentialsFlow(credentials, tokenEndpoint.toString(), httpClient);
217    }
218
219    private TokenSupplier createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
220            final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
221        return new ClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(),
222            credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
223    }
224
225    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
226        return withTokenSupplier(
227            createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, requireNonNull(httpClient)));
228    }
229
230    public ClientBuilder withClientCredentialsFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
231            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
232        return withTokenSupplier(createClientCredentialsTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient));
233    }
234
235    public ClientBuilder withStaticTokenFlow(final AuthenticationToken token) {
236        return withTokenSupplier(new StaticTokenSupplier(token));
237    }
238
239    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint) {
240        return withTokenSupplier(
241            createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, requireNonNull(httpClient)));
242    }
243
244    public ClientBuilder withAnonymousSessionFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String tokenEndpoint,
245            VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
246        return withTokenSupplier(createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials, tokenEndpoint, httpClient));
247    }
248
249    private TokenSupplier createAnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
250            final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
251        return new AnonymousSessionTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(),
252            credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
253    }
254
255    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
256            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint) {
257        return withTokenSupplier(createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials, email, password, tokenEndpoint,
258            requireNonNull(httpClient)));
259    }
260
261    public ClientBuilder withGlobalCustomerPasswordFlow(final ClientCredentials credentials, final String email,
262            final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
263        return withTokenSupplier(
264            createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials, email, password, tokenEndpoint, httpClient));
265    }
266
267    private TokenSupplier createGlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(final ClientCredentials credentials,
268            final String email, final String password, final String tokenEndpoint, final VrapHttpClient httpClient) {
269        return new GlobalCustomerPasswordTokenSupplier(credentials.getClientId(), credentials.getClientSecret(), email,
270            password, credentials.getScopes(), tokenEndpoint, httpClient);
271    }
272
273    public ClientBuilder addAcceptGZipMiddleware() {
274        return addMiddleware(AcceptGZipMiddleware.of());
275    }
276
277    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware(final Supplier<ErrorMiddleware> errorMiddleware) {
278        this.errorMiddleware = errorMiddleware;
279        return this;
280    }
281
282    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware() {
283        return withErrorMiddleware(() -> ErrorMiddleware.of(httpExceptionFactory.get()));
284    }
285
286    public ClientBuilder withErrorMiddleware(final ErrorMiddleware errorMiddleware) {
287        return withErrorMiddleware(() -> errorMiddleware);
288    }
289
290    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(Supplier<RetryMiddleware> retryMiddleware) {
291        this.retryMiddleware = retryMiddleware;
292        return this;
293    }
294
295    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(RetryMiddleware retryMiddleware) {
296        return withRetryMiddleware(() -> retryMiddleware);
297    }
298
299    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries) {
300        return withRetryMiddleware(new RetryMiddleware(maxRetries));
301    }
302
303    public ClientBuilder withRetryMiddleware(final int maxRetries, List<Integer> statusCodes) {
304        return withRetryMiddleware(new RetryMiddleware(maxRetries, statusCodes));
305    }
306
307    public ClientBuilder withOAuthMiddleware(final Supplier<OAuthMiddleware> oAuthMiddleware) {
308        this.oAuthMiddleware = oAuthMiddleware;
309        return this;
310    }
311
312    public ClientBuilder withOAuthMiddleware(final OAuthMiddleware oAuthMiddleware) {
313        return withOAuthMiddleware(() -> oAuthMiddleware);
314    }
315
316    public ClientBuilder withTokenSupplier(final TokenSupplier tokenSupplier) {
317        final OAuthHandler oAuthHandler = new OAuthHandler(tokenSupplier);
318        return withOAuthMiddleware(OAuthMiddleware.of(oAuthHandler));
319    }
320
321    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerMiddleware(final InternalLoggerMiddleware internalLoggerMiddleware) {
322        this.internalLoggerMiddleware = internalLoggerMiddleware;
323        return this;
324    }
325
326    public ClientBuilder withInternalLoggerFactory(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory) {
327        return withInternalLoggerMiddleware(InternalLoggerMiddleware.of(internalLoggerFactory));
328    }
329
330    public ClientBuilder withApiBaseUrl(String apiBaseUrl) {
331        return withApiBaseUrl(URI.create(apiBaseUrl));
332    }
333
334    public ClientBuilder withApiBaseUrl(final URI apiBaseUrl) {
335        this.apiBaseUrl = apiBaseUrl;
336        return this;
337    }
338
339    public ClientBuilder withUserAgentSupplier(final Supplier<String> userAgentSupplier) {
340        return withUserAgentMiddleware(new UserAgentMiddleware(userAgentSupplier.get()));
341    }
342
343    private ClientBuilder withUserAgentMiddleware(final UserAgentMiddleware userAgentMiddleware) {
344        this.userAgentMiddleware = userAgentMiddleware;
345        return this;
346    }
347
348    public ClientBuilder addCorrelationIdProvider(final @Nullable CorrelationIdProvider correlationIdProvider) {
349        if (correlationIdProvider != null) {
350            return addMiddleware((request, next) -> next.apply(
351                request.withHeader(ApiHttpHeaders.X_CORRELATION_ID, correlationIdProvider.getCorrelationId())));
352        }
353        return this;
354    }
355
356    /**
357     * sets the middlewares to be configured for the client.
358     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
359     * @return ClientBuilder instance
360     */
361    public ClientBuilder withMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
362        this.middlewares = new ArrayList<>(middlewares);
363        return this;
364    }
365
366    /**
367     * sets the middlewares to be configured for the client.
368     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
369     * @return ClientBuilder instance
370     */
371    public ClientBuilder withMiddleware(final Middleware middleware, final Middleware... middlewares) {
372        this.middlewares = new ArrayList<>(Collections.singletonList(middleware));
373        if (middlewares.length > 0) {
374            this.middlewares.addAll(Arrays.asList(middlewares));
375        }
376        return this;
377    }
378
379    /**
380     * adds the middlewares to be configured for the client.
381     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
382     * @return ClientBuilder instance
383     */
384    public ClientBuilder addMiddlewares(final List<Middleware> middlewares) {
385        this.middlewares.addAll(middlewares);
386        return this;
387    }
388
389    /**
390     * adds the middlewares to be configured for the client.
391     * @param middlewares {@link Middleware} instances
392     * @return ClientBuilder instance
393     */
394    public ClientBuilder addMiddleware(final Middleware middleware, final Middleware... middlewares) {
395        this.middlewares.add(middleware);
396        if (middlewares.length > 0) {
397            this.middlewares.addAll(Arrays.asList(middlewares));
398        }
399        return this;
400    }
401
402    public ApiHttpClient build() {
403        return ApiHttpClient.of(requireNonNull(apiBaseUrl), requireNonNull(stack.get()),
404            requireNonNull(serializer.get()));
405    }
406
407    public static String buildDefaultUserAgent() {
408        String runtimeVersion = SystemUtils.JAVA_RUNTIME_VERSION;
409        String osName = SystemUtils.OS_NAME;
410        String osArch = SystemUtils.OS_ARCH;
411        String sdkVersion = BuildInfo.VERSION;
412        return userAgent + sdkVersion + " " + " Java/" + runtimeVersion + " (" + osName + "; " + osArch + ")";
413    }
414}
